name: Alexandr
role: chief expert on project architecture and code organization, as well as on design patterns and semantics
aboutMe: I am 20 y.o. and i am study to become a professional software engineer both at the university and the RSSchool. I love to learn something new and try to reach as high as possible!

name: Veronika
role: specialist in content generation and use of external libraries, chief expert on slider integration
aboutMe: I am 30 y.o. and i am engineer in the field of energy in railway transport with 5 years of experience, now i went on maternity leave. My motto is 'Maternity leave is a time of opportunities!'. I'm trying to learn a new profession to enjoy my future work!

name: Dmitriy
role: initiator of the creation of the 'JSCrackers' development team, chief for coordination and selection of priority tasks
aboutMe: I am 30 y.o. and i am engaged in startup projects and the introduction of innovations in railway transport. I dream of becoming a web developer and plan to study React and Angular in the near future!
